cn.campusapp.pan.autorender

Class AutoRenderViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.campusapp.pan.GeneralViewModel
      • cn.campusapp.pan.autorender.AutoRenderViewModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoRender, FactoryViewModel, ViewModel

    public abstract class AutoRenderViewModel
extends GeneralViewModel
implements AutoRender
    Automatically trigger render on particular lifecycle status: 1. Activity.onResume 2. Fragment.onResume 3. Fragment.setUserVisibleHint(true) Configure it using autoRender() and autoRender(boolean) Created by nius on 10/13/15.
